description: Complex multi-file refactor with full test coverage — should be approved
issueTitle: Refactor event system to use EventEmitter pattern
acceptanceCriteria:
- Custom event system replaced with EventEmitter
- All event handlers migrated
- Tests for emit, on, off, once
- No behavior change for consumers

description: Adding error code to HTTP status mapping — should be approved
issueTitle: Map internal error codes to HTTP status codes
acceptanceCriteria:
- Error codes mapped to appropriate HTTP statuses
- User-friendly messages per code
- Test for each error code mapping

description: Adding middleware chain for request processing — should be approved
issueTitle: Add middleware pipeline for API requests
acceptanceCriteria:
- Middleware chain: auth → validate → handler → response
- Middleware composable via use()
- Tests for chain execution order

description: Adding database connection pooling — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- Pool size configurable (default 10)
- Connections reused across requests
- Pool drain on shutdown
- Tests for pool lifecycle

description: Replacing console.log with structured logger — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- All console.log replaced with pino logger
- Log levels: debug, info, warn, error
- JSON output in production, pretty in dev

description: Adding API versioning — should be approved
issueTitle: Add v1 prefix to API routes
acceptanceCriteria:
- All routes prefixed with /api/v1/
- Old routes redirect to v1
- Tests updated for new paths

description: Adding circuit breaker pattern — should be approved
issueTitle: Add circuit breaker for external service calls
acceptanceCriteria:
- Circuit opens after 3 consecutive failures
- Half-open state after 30s cooldown
- Tests for all states: closed, open, half-open

description: Replacing hand-rolled mocks with vitest mocks — should be approved
issueTitle: Migrate test doubles to vitest mocks
acceptanceCriteria:
- Hand-rolled mock classes replaced with vi.fn()
- vi.mock() used for module mocking
- No test behavior change

description: Adding Docker Compose for local development — should be approved
acceptanceCriteria:
- docker-compose.yml with app + db services
- Volume mounts for hot reload
- README updated with Docker instructions

description: Adding OpenAPI specification — should be approved
issueTitle: Generate OpenAPI spec from route definitions
acceptanceCriteria:
- OpenAPI 3.0 spec generated
- All endpoints documented
- Served at /api/docs
- Test validates spec is valid JSON
